str.en: Dismiss suggested posts automatically|Suggested posts won't appear repeatedly after scrolling past them once.

func: function(){ if (plugin.dspa.pref.toggle && plugin.dspa.context){ $(window).scroll(function(){ if ($('.post_dismiss').length) { let top = $(window).scrollTop(), postBottom = $('.post_dismiss').parents().eq(5).offset().top + $('.post_dismiss').parents().eq(5).outerHeight() + 300; if (postBottom < top){ $('.post_dismiss').children().last()[0].click() }; if (!$('.post_dismiss').length) { postBottom = null; } } }) }}
